There are several ski movies that you can put on and watch over and over again.  This is one of them.  The music will get stuck in your head and you'll start doing your snow dance as soon as it comes on.  It's more freestyle oriented than big mountain, but it does a good job of balancing everything out with great cinematography so you're excited and ready to ride.  Oh, don't bother with the special features, not worth it.

Seeing people make love while skiing down the side of a mountain is great to  jack to, but I found the story rather lackluster. The main character was completely unbelievable, and I found myself knowing exactly what was going to happen next, as the plot was simple and routine as far as porns go. I only suggest this to avid fans of skiing, mountains, and sex.
